name: The Sims 4: Urban Homage Kit
description: Strut boldly into the now with iconic styles from The Sims 4 Urban Homage Kit.

name: Wartales: The Tavern Opens!
description: Manage and expand your own tavern in this management and simulation expansion for Wartales. During your adventures, secure wealth and prestige for your troop.

name: Karga
description: In the game "Karga," players become hero defenders aided by a dragon to battle the witch Hag and her dark army. Armed with elemental revolvers and special skills, they combat various foes. The hero's abilities and weapons strengthen with each battle.

name: Hidden Riddles. The Amazon Mystery
description: Help the detective crack a difficult case! Hundreds of exciting levels! Hidden Riddles - The Amazon Mystery: Solve mysterious puzzles!

name: Dreadrun
description: DreadRun is a top-down bullet hell with roguelike elements. Where you must explore and gather various forms of loot such as guns, potions, and perks in a limited period of time in order to evade and shoot hordes of various enemies while escorting a payload to safety.

name: Ghost Talker
description: Have you ever wondered if your house is haunted? With ghost talker you can find out and have conversations with potential paranormal entities.

name: Hungry Tiger
description: Hungry Tiger game is an exciting physics-based puzzle game in which your task is to deliver a piece of meat to a hungry tiger by breaking the chains in the right order and at the right moment.

name: Goblin Boom
description: Embark on the role of a cunning goblin, whose passion is to place explosive bombs around the map. Your goal is to defeat enemies, complete levels, and become a true master of explosions! Get ready for an explosive adventure in the world of goblins and bombs!

name: Uneasy Memories
description: A Psychological Horror Game Set in Everyday Life

name: Undead Tower Defense
description: Where the player will have to defend the location by placing towers and withstand waves of attacking enemies. In this 3D game, you will find yourself facing the task of repelling hordes of skeletons and monsters.

name: Archer 3D: Bow Shooting Range
description: Test your shooting and accuracy skills - become the best shooter in the target shooting simulator!

name: Scary In The Journey
description: Scary In is a Co-op Horror game, set in the post-apocalyptic future due to radiation called Solar, and you have to live in underground station where it connect to all the world station. Travel with friends, many solar entity lurking around, and you have to solve puzzle, Start your journey now!

name: Press Any Key
description: Just press any key.

name: The Twisting Trail of Clues
description: The Twisting Trail of Clues is a captivating and thrilling modern-day murder mystery. Set in a bustling city, the story follows detective Emma as she tries to solve a seemingly impossible case - the murder of a prominent businessman by a mysterious secret society.

name: Sokoseed
description: Discover the joy of puzzle-solving with a natural twist in Sokoseed. Grow saplings and strategically maneuver boxes through clever, minimalist stages in this peaceful yet challenging gaming experience.

name: DopeNet
description: DopeNet is a fantasy dark web drug dealing simulator. Buy low, sell high, stay free.

name: Project13: Nightwatch
description: A new Observer Gametype where you take on the role of an Observer tasked with guarding the HQ of the Project 13 Corp. . Prevent any Observer Prisoner, each potentially containing a anomaly, from infiltrating the HQ. Equipped with a high-tech binocular, your observation skills are the key to success.

name: Coffee For Cthulhu
description: Coffee For Cthulhu is a Lovecraftian Comfy Coffee Shop Simulator. During the day, you serve customers, brew coffee, and keep the various coffee machines from exploding or attacking customers. During the Night you hunt for ingredients in the dark woods where the feral monsters lay in wait.

name: SGS Battle For: Hue
description: The battle of Hué is an epic fight during the audacious 1968 Tết offensive launched by the Communists during the Vietnam War. Relive one of the longest, bloodiest battles the Americans would fight against VC in that emblematic conflict.

name: Zhuzi Subdues Demons
description: This is a CRPG game, you can operate a team of 5 people to explore together. Combat is real-time, but allows players to pause the game mid-game to give orders to their team members. The controls refer to Dragon Age origins and Dragon Age II. If you like Dragon Age, you can try to play this game

name: Sticky Arrow
description: A Sokoban-like puzzle game, which can be solved using only the arrow keys.

name: Astrolancer
description: ASTROLANCER combines top-down shooter and shoot 'em up gameplay into one action-packed experience! Devise your own playstyle with a huge variety of weapons. Hardcore and casual players alike are welcome!

name: 4 in a Row
description: Everybody knows it, everybody loves it!

name: Bunny Garden
description:
Enjoy a conversation with the cast while having a drink!
This is a dating sim adventure game that takes place in a gentlemen's haven called "Bunny Garden".
At "Bunny Garden", you can enjoy drinking with the adorable staff, and develop relationships.
Forget about your daily stress and enjoy to your heart's content.
Your choices will shape the narrative. The fate of your relationships rests solely in your hands.

name: Grabbers in the Woods
description: A unique first person atmospheric exploration game set in a surreal woods nestled within the confines of a bizarre dream known as the Collective Reverie, a nexus of all dreamers where their individual hopes and fears coalesce into a bizarre nightmare.

name: Sker Ritual: Headless Wanderer
description: Let’s face it, you’ve been known to turn a few heads, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Sker Ritual: Murder Express
description: Get on the right track and have your tickets at the ready for the Murder Express, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Evil Sinister
description: You're a journalist investigating an abandoned house. Armed with only a flashlight, navigate its haunted halls to uncover its secrets. Beware, malevolent forces lurk, blurring reality and nightmare. Will you survive to reveal the truth, or become another victim of its sinister grasp?

name: Meteor Havok
description: Meteor Havok is a take on the classic Asteroids arcade shooter. Enter the asteroid fields to blast a path to safety with your agile ship and powerful lasers.

name: House Builder: The Atomic Age DLC
description: Hope for the best, but prepare for the worst Build new 3 houses! A house prepared to test the power of nukes, a shelter to hide from them, and a UFO house for all other unpredictable events. All that in "The Atomic Age", the first DLC to House Builder.

name: Strike Rush
description:
Embark on the Ultimate Battle Sports Event of the 22nd Century!

This team-based XR FPS game thrives on communication with your AI companion, Blitzmon.

Traverse from Seoul-inspired landscapes to technologically advanced stadiums, immersing yourself in a unique and intense 4v4 battleﬁeld.

Gear up for the thrill, pilot the colossal Colossus machine, and lead your team to victory with unmatched ﬁrepower!

name: Midnight of Despair
description: Get ready for an endless challenge as you climb to the top. Speed is key to setting records, but staying calm is just as important. The journey ahead won't be easy, so brace yourself for a test of skill and determination!

name: Tenfold Loop
description: Tenfold Loop is a short walking simulator where the player is trapped inside an endless loop. The only way to exit is find 10 consecutives anomalies.

name: Galactic Ruler Enlightenment
description: Play campaign stories within the Galactic Ruler universe. Invade the galaxy to eliminate those who stand in your way or rally alien races to defend against the invaders. Fight battles at both planet and space across a procedurally generated galaxy. Use new unit control systems to manage your forces.

name: Flag & Country
description: Form words, gather resources, and build your team of experts ready to explore the planet.

name: Aery: Cyber City
description: In Aery Cyber City you play a little bird on its journey to find a home after losing its dear friend. You will discover unknown, giant, and beautiful environments and you will be able to enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a whole world filled with beauty and little secrets.

name: Final Fantasy XVI: The Rising Tide
description: The Rising Tide is the second DLC for Final Fantasy XVI, which will bring new challenges, new locations and more, including the confrontation between Clive and the legendary Eikon, Leviathan.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: No Rest for the Wicked
description: From Moon Studios, the award-winning developers of Ori and the Blind Forest and Ori and the Will of the Wisps comes No Rest for the Wicked, a visceral, precision Action RPG set to reinvent the genre.

name: Umurangi Generation VR
description:
Experience the award-winning creative sandbox photography game in VR!

Set in Tauranga, Aotearoa off the back of an impending crisis, life is bleak for those living in the city. As a courier for the Tauranga Express who is also an avid photographer, you have the freedom to travel around the city to document the impending doom through the lense of your camera.

name: Soul Covenant
description: The moving experience of a story of life told through death.A VR Tactical Action game experience with a high level of immersion, where the player will be one with the protagonist and take on a battle for the fate of the world.

name: Galactic Civilizations IV: Warlords
description: Transform combat with custom military doctrines, controlling ship behavior and strategy. Set precise war aims and conquest goals with the War Planning interface, influencing public opinion. Enjoy enhanced combat, intricate ship designs, detailed reports, deepening strategic warfare.

name: Monstronomy
description: Monstronomy is a dark take on the timeless monster collecting genre. As you explore a cute world filled with quirky monsters and odd NPCs, a deep and sinister story unfolds with the discovery of found-films and unsettling glitches. This game is not suitable for individuals who are easily disturbed.

name: Artificer's Tower
description: Are you the master of the magical arts? Prove it in this new colony-sim wizard tower defense game. Build your base, keep your mages happy, craft recipes, research new magics, and defend your wizard's keep. Will your Artificer's Tower be the envy of all your magical friends?

name: Nexus 5X
description: Stellaris Nexus is a turn-based multiplayer 4X game that respects your time, giving you the full spectrum of a thrilling, strategic 4X experience. Play as unique factions and leaders against up to 5 other players, plotting and battling your way to galactic dominance; all of it in about an hour.

name: Exodus
description: Exodus is a game that blends a god-game and a puzzle game, themed around the "Book of Exodus". As the hand of God, manipulate water, land, and other elements to solve intricate puzzles and lead the Hebrews out of Egypt.

name: Trackline Express
description: Gather and transform the sparse resources of the desert to build a little train capable of overcoming the dangers of the wilderness. Trackline Express is a short casual game that will challenge your strategic and management skills.

name: Before the Dawn
description: "Before The Dawn" is a top-down perspective shooting Rougelite game! In a city where a zombie virus suddenly broke out, upgrade weapons, drive vehicles, search for supplies, and activate Signal towers for rescue! Use strategy to combine your equipment and fight your way out of the zombie tide!

name: Avopug Show
description: "Avopug Show" is an arcade racing game that not only challenges the traditional rules of the genre but also dynamically changes its settings during the race. From celestial realms to vintage 1930s animation styles.

name: Vivat Slovakia
description: Vivat Slovakia is a third-person shooter set in the 90s´ Bratislava, the capital of Slovakia, where the streets are full of thugs and local mafia supported by the corrupted government. The game contains five weapons to use, 30 classic cars of that time to drive and one open city to explore.

name: Smelogs Playground
description: Smelogs Playground is a Free-to-Play Real-Time Strategy game with charming aesthetics and a simple but effective gameplay mechanism. Take over the playful and rocky Smelogs to compete against each other for fun and honor!

name: Sker Ritual
description: The co-op survival FPS and spiritual successor to the award-winning occult horror, Maid of Sker. Play solo or up to 4 players to survive the supernatural onslaught of the Quiet Ones.

name: Tales of Wild
description: Tales of Wild is a multi person online survival competitive online game. You can experience gathering, manufacturing, hunting, harvesting, building, researching, and you need to challenge survival. There are other invaders who need you to show courage and look directly at them!

name: Laser Limbo
description: Laser Limbo is an AR battle game compilation. It transforms homes, offices, or entire floors into unique AR multiplayer arenas that make perfect use of every square meter of space as they wrap around any obstacle.

name: Burger Witch
description: A witch that cooks burgers in her dungeon, in a spooky flavored burger-making experience. Enjoy the thrill with your friends as all of you try to complete orders before it's too late.

name: GB Studio's 5th Anniversary
description:
GB Studio is 5 years old!

Join us on a journey through all the major releases of GB Studio an see how far the software has come over the last five years.

Created by the team at GB Studio Central

Programming by RubenRetro

Art Advisor - 2bitcrook

Theatre Song by Beatscribe

name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 RR+
description:
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 RR+ is an arcade racing game developed and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment, based on the Wangan Midnight manga. As the thirteenth installment in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune arcade series, this game marks the third upgrade to Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6, following the 6 R and 6 RR updates. It was released in Japan on April 17, 2024, with the release date for the Asian version yet to be confirmed.

The game was announced during a live stream celebrating the 20th anniversary of the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune series.

name: iceicellClicker
description: Sin descripción

name: Call To Summon
description: A short game where you can use an old phone to summon objects by simply calling them. Use it to advance through the old complex, reminiscent of liminal spaces.

name: Isekai Dispatcher
description: Sin descripción

name: AAA Clock: Extreme Complete
description: Sin descripción

name: Tin Can + Starward Rogue: Survive in Space Bundle Deluxe
description: Survive in space with cunning and knowledge, or shoot your way to freedom!

name: Alien Cleaner
description: Sin descripción

name: Traintracks Combat
description: Traintracks Combat is a fighting game set on the Chicago CTA. Choose your commuter and duke it out at the California blue line stop.

name: ZomboidGuessr
description: ZomboidGuessr is a browser game inspired by the popular GeoGuessr game. The player is shown various screenshot from the game Project Zomboid and has to find the locations on the game's map.

name: The Lost Village: JiangHu
description: The Out World undergoes another anomaly, with a mysterious sect rising. Its members come from various sects, their realms far surpass average humans, viewed almost as divine or saintly. Once unpredictable and secretive, some hidden in wilderness or concealed in bustling areas....

name: Dead Island 2: SoLA
description: Stage dive into the heart of SoLA, the ultimate Californian music festival, built upon ancient grounds... Stalking the pulsating heart of LA's final rave is a psychedelic beat that has unleashed total chaos, leaving nothing but a rotting crater of gore and a malevolent presence haunting the shadows. Something is out there and it’s still hungry.

name: Fate/Samurai Remnant: Additional Episode 2 - Record's Fragment: Yagyu Sword Chronicles
description: The power of the Ritual swirling around Edo attracts many oddities. Tsujigiri of tremendous skill. A mysterious deadly blade. Investigating the situation, Miyamoto Iori comes face to face with Yagyu Munenori, a Rogue Saber.

name: Forza Motorsport: 1970 Matra-Simca #146 Equipe Matra-Simca MS650 Tour de France
description: Forza Motorsport 1970 Matra-Simca #146 Equipe Matra-Simca MS650 Tour de France

name: Do Not Feed the Monkeys 2099: Four Cage Gourmet Pack
description: Welcome to the future of the Primate Observation Club. In this second DLC called "Two Cage Seasoning Pack", spy on strangers through four new security cameras, invade their privacy, and uncover their secrets in this digital voyeur simulator.

name: Idle Champions: Chibi Spurt Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Spurt (if you don't already own them) Chibi Spurt Skin An Epic Feat for Spurt 7 Gold Spurt Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Project Apidom: Classic Samurai Set
description: Classic Samurai Armor Set including the Helmet, Chestpiece, Leggings, Gloves and Boots

name: Minion Masters: Frostbite
description:
The Frostbite DLC is a great +300% value bundle to empower your Accursed undead army! You also get a headstart in the Season Pass!

Includes:
- Nyrvir the Fallen (Legendary card)
- 20x Frostbearer (Supreme card)
- Nyrvir Awakens Avatar (Legendary Avatar)
- 20x Haunting Hugger
- 40x Ghost Turret
- 40x Ghast
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

Harness the power of the beyond with this unholy DLC. Freeze and Curse your enemies with Frostbearear and Haunting to weaken them before you finish them off, then raise them to fight for you with Ghast. Playing enough Accursed cards will let you summon Nyrvir the Fallen, a mighty dragon that will lay waste to your enemies.

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 - Trianga Maid Outfit #1
description: Trianga Maid Outfit #1 - Beautiful maid outfit for Trianga

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 - Temiko Maid Outfit #1
description: Temiko Maid Outfit #1 - Beautiful maid outfit for Temiko

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 - Quadra Maid Outfit #1
description: Quadra Maid Outfit #1 - Beautiful maid outfit for Quadra

name: Trianga's Project: Battle Splash 2.0 - Pentaga Maid Outfit #1
description: Pentaga Maid Outfit #1 - Beautiful maid outfit for Pentaga

name: Idle Champions: Action Figure Melf Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Melf (if you don't already own them) Action Figure Melf Skin An Epic Feat for Melf 7 Gold Melf Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Plushie Antrius Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Antrius (if you don't already own them) Plushie Antrius Skin An Epic Feat for Antrius 7 Gold Antrius Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Barro F22: Pack #1
description: Support the Barro series and get 3 extra race tracks to play on.

name: Barro T23: Pack #1
description: Support the Barro series and get 3 extra race tracks to play on.

name: Raidborn: Founder's Pack
description: The RAIDBORN Founder's Pack offers a collection of rare and exclusive bonus content, typically reserved for special occasions. With 60 legendary items and more than 20 new enchantments introduced to the game, this pack has you covered for all your raiding needs.

name: Rento Fortune: Dice Configurator
description: Rento Dice Configurator is an optional dice editor plugin, which allows you to make your own custom dice to be used in the online, solo and local games. You can make dice like: 0 5 7 7 10 10 or 0 0 10 10 1 1 and be able to choose it before you roll

name: Daisy Chain
description: Daisy Chain is a queer, epistolary interactive fiction game, where the player reads diary entries, documents, and audio transcriptions by the scientist Benjamin Holloway and the perfect duplicate he created based on himself.

name: Hodgepodge Hunch: Premium Pack - Sakura
description: Hodgepodge Hunch DLC includes numerous new playable characters and item archetypes. Once purchased, these characters will be unlocked and new ingredients and Relics will start to appear in Multiplayer and Ghost matches.

name: Spirit Swap
description: A love story of a body swap between a man and a woman sharing one body.

name: Apollo 13: The Lost Tapes VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Tiny Robots: Portal Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: The Highlands of Jurgald
description: Fantasy Game

name: Solar Kingdoms: Human Survival
description: Solar Kingdoms is a real-time strategy game where you command forces across solar systems, engaging in large battles both in space and on the surfaces planets. Establish colonies, find resources and artifacts, and fight up to 8 factions in skirmish, large campaign, missions, and multiplayer.

name: Block Man Adventures
description: This is a game that you are meant to rage at and try your best at with ten unique levels personally designed by me to tort... Make sure the payer has the most enjoyable time possible. I wish all changers luck and have fun.

name: Super Adventure
description: Players will play as special forces and carry out dangerous and tense tasks

name: Eclipse: Echo of Dimension
description: Eclipse: Echo of Dimension is an adventure game. Players explore the ruins of an alien civilization, discovering and listening to fragments of poetry from another dimension, searching for clues to the lost remnants of an extraterrestrial civilization, where vast distances shrink to mere steps.

name: Glow
description: GLOW is an addictive physics-based arcade game that will challenge you to your limits. Push, dodge, and trick enemies while collecting points as the difficulty increases.

name: Twizzle Puzzle: Rodents
description: Twizzle Puzzle: Rodents - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.

name: It's Not Rocket Science!
description: Build the best rocket with your partner and race the other team through space! It’s Not Rocket Science! offers 2 versus 2 local multiplayer. It is played with controllers.

name: SoulTail
description: Play SoulTail and save the forest. Summon and nurture a guardian spirit with various cards and their combinations to protect the forest from the encroaching monsters. Become a guardian who defends the forest with the power of your strategy and luck!

name: Clone War
description: It's a roguelike game that gets stronger by winning a fight against clones.

name: Just a Cute Capybara Puzzle
description: Just a Cute Capybara Puzzle to keep you happy.

name: Brave Hero
description: This is a classic shooting game!

name: Escape
description: A sports zombie fighting game that uses props from different scenes to fight against zombies, completing various level tasks and opening the next level. Each level has different gameplay

name: Animal Farm Jigsaw Games for Toddlers, Babys and Kids
description: The ultimate farm children's game with lots of animal puzzles and farm motifs. The perfect learning game for all children, toddlers, babies, jigsaw puzzle and animal lovers. Familyfriendly!

name: Funny Farm Learning Games for Toddlers and Kids
description: Does your child like farm animals, farm life, animated puzzles and want to learn their first colors, shapes and sizes? Then get your child our new Farm Games educational game, which includes different animated levels and a ton of fun.

name: Car Wash
description: The ultimate cars game for kids and preschool children. Featuring a lot of different cars and vehicles and lots of tools to choose from for cleaning cars and even make cars dirty again. A perfect family friendly game for all children, kids, toddlers. Very cute car wash!

name: Catarsis: Catventure
description: Step into an exciting journey in Catarsis, a rogue-like action game where you are the last hope for the world. In this outlaw-like action game, surviving enemy attacks in each room will require careful choices of upgrading your character's abilities and the features of the weapons in your inventory.

name: Exoprimal: Season 4
description:
The third Capcom Collab is slated to release its set of collaborative content with Mega Man alongside Title Update 4.
It'll include suit skins, decals, charms, stamps, and emotes based on the beloved Mega Man franchise!

name: Cats in the Ancient City of Gu Su
description: In the ancient city of Gu Su during the Qing Dynasty, embark on a quest to find adorable cats! Let the cats collide with historical scenes and characters in amusing ways."

name: Defend It!
description: Defend it! Are you sure you can defend the base until the last enemy? Try your luck because it's free to play!

name: My Love With The GirlsGroup
description: Under Seoul lights, as a substitute driver, you take an order from a mysterious girl. Facing you is the popular girl group, Little Angel. Smartly posing as their manager, you become an overnight music industry icon! Love's scent and career prospects beckon - how will you decide?

name: Firesky
description: Firesky is a multiplayer action RPG with strategic PVP and card collection elements. The game follows a cast of heroes who overcome tremendous odds to fight a great evil spreading throughout the universe.

name: Divnozemye
description: "Divnozemye" is a card game like the famous game "Arcomage" (from "Might&Magic"), but in the setting of folk fairy tales and with its own feature - heroes.

name: Emulated: OpsRunner
description: As an OpsRunner you get emulated into dangerous Scertanic City to complete missions and find out the truth about your identity.

name: HopStepHotspring
description: HopStepHotspirng is a simple jumping action game Using a simple but deep 3-step jump Let's overcome various terrains to reach the legendary secret hot spring together with the main character, Atsumi.

name: Shikhondo: Youkai Rampage
description: Popular vertically scrolling shoot'em up game Shikhondo is back and powered up! One day, the soul-starved Youkai escape from the depths of hell. Now, the story of the Grim Reaper and the girl who has fallen into this land begins!

name: 44 The Jail
description: A point & click adventure game

name: Uncrowned
description: Set sail in Uncrowned, an age of sail adventure where you command a struggling colony under an oppressive monarchy, and chart a course towards independence. Will you seek fortune through cunning trade or brandish the sword as a fearsome pirate? Your choices shape the destiny of your people.

name: Pigeon
description: A multiplayer FPS game with cool pigeons

name: ReMix
description: ReMix is a unique musical rhythm action game that combines the elements of Rogue games. In this world, you are able to choose from a variety of heroes with different fighting styles and use the power of music to battle against evil void monsters.

name: Morels: The Hunt 2
description: Morels: The Hunt 2 is the sequel to Morels: The Hunt. It is a simulation game about mushroom hunting and wildlife photography. Explore a diverse range of locations spanning across the globe. Increase your hunter and photographer levels by collecting a variety of mushrooms, photographing animals, and completing weekly tasks.

name: Big Shots
description: Gear up, team up, and exterminate! Become the ultimate mech pilot in BIG SHOTSⓇ, the action-packed VR roguelite where you’ll battle alien hordes, earn upgrades, and forge an unstoppable mech to reclaim Earth.

name: Kingsgrave
description: Kingsgrave is an enchanting metroidvania adventure inspired by classic Zelda games. Assume the mantle of a resurrected king on a royal quest to rescue your subjects, restore the ruined kingdom, and rekindle its lost glory. The fate of the realm is in your hands.

name: Project Entropy
description: Welcome, commander, to Project Entropy- an ultimate Sci-Fi and role-playing mobile game with battles in space. In this immersive MMO experience, you will command alien civilizations, conquer uncharted planets, and build Hero fleets.

name: Resurrection Island: Love and Victory
description: The game is a turn-based bullet hell RPG, where a knight with amnesia arrives on a mysterious island and embarks on an adventure to find a way to leave.

name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection - Ritual of Bonds: Vol. 2
description: In Volume 2 you'll get Rain, Seven, Alice, Eugeo, Leafa, ???, Medina, Kureha and Zeliska.

name: The Mildew Children
description: Featuring a blend of 2D adventure and visual novel, The Mildew Children is a grim tale about a village inhabited only by children who follow savage pagan traditions. A young witch named Kyrphel, along with her sisters, are bound to perform a macabre Ritual in order to save their village.

name: Rolando: Deluxe Edition
description: Roll, bounce and blast your squad of Rolandos across the Rolando Kingdom in this charming and delightful puzzle platformer

name: DiggerSim
description:
DiggerSim - Virtual reality Excavator & Heavy Equipment Simulator.

DiggerSim is a thrilling excavator and heavy equipment simulator that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful excavator. With realistic controls, you'll feel like you're really operating heavy machinery.

In this game, you'll be tasked with completing a variety of excavation jobs, from digging foundations to clearing land. You'll have to carefully manoeuvre your excavator through tight spaces and navigate around obstacles to complete the level.

As you progress through the game, you'll challenges that will test your skills and abilities. With immersive gameplay and realistic controls, Digger Sim is the ultimate experience for fans of construction and heavy machinery. So put on your hard hat and get ready to dig in!

name: My Candy Love: New Gen
description:
Discover the colorful streets of Amoris, work in the coolest office in the whole city, and most of all, get to know your attractive coworkers, become friends with them, or even more...

My Candy Love: New Gen is a new game from the My Candy Love franchise.

name: Cyber League Football
description: Futuristic robot football! Upgrade your team, call the plays, and drive your robots to victory on the field.

name: This is a Ghost
description: This Is a Ghost is a horror game in which you embody a ghost hunter. This action game will immerse you in the heart of a paranormal investigation, in solo or multiplayer.

name: Tokyo Debunker
description: A dark fantasy otome game for iOS and Android.

name: Corsair's Madness
description: As the captain of the pirate ship Sam, you will immerse yourself in the adventure tale of a mystical archipelago full of secrets and treasures. Using pirate skills and ancient artifacts, save the crew members scattered around the different islands and discover the dark secrets of a mysterious temple

name: Mightyy's FPS Aim Trainer
description: Mightyy's FPS Aim Trainer takes Aim Training to the next level. All new features you didn't even know you wanted from aim training, including replay system, advanced statistics and a wealth of customization designed to rival other aim trainers on the market.

name: 下一站江湖Ⅱ
description: "Next Stop Jianghu II" is a seamless large-map open world martial arts stand-alone game developed by Bai Yujing Studio. It inherits the production concept of returning to the game itself and paying for buyouts without krypton gold in-app purchases: no lock-in real-time battles, 300 square kilometers seamless...

name: Rauniot
description: Rauniot is an isometric post-apocalyptic point and click adventure game which takes place in Northern Finland.

name: Gambol 2
description: 'Mario never returned from his last venture and rumours of a quiz crazy lunatic echo throughout the land. It's up to his dear brother Luigi and his trusty friend Captain Toad to adventure out and find some answers.'

name: Grand Theft Auto: New York
description: Grand Theft Auto: New York is an unofficial Grand Theft Auto game for browsers developed and released by Kiz10. The game follows a set of missions the player has to achieve within the 3D world.

name: Alone in the Dark: The New Nightmare
description:
Return to Shadow Island in this emulation of the classic PS survival horror, playable on PS5 for the first time.

From the moment Edward Carnby and Aline Cedrac set foot on Shadow Island, they are stalked by mysterious, evil creatures intent on thwarting their quest to find the three ancient tablets that could hold the key to an otherworldly power. Danger lurks at every corner – do you have what it takes to fight back evil once and for all?

name: Project Missionary: The Reckoning of Hizzokahpolis
description: A kinetic visual novel about a CEO's search for justice and an unexpected happening.

name: Epic Empire
description: Prepare for the ultimate tower defense experience in Epic Empire - Tower Defense! Will you answer the call to defend the kingdom and become the legendary hero the realm needs? name: Hellmouth Pizza
description: Welcome to the Hellmouth team! Our mission is to bring chaos, disarray and high quality customer service upon this world! Prepare pizza according to the pictures of orders! Add cheese, Mysterious tomato sauce (which is definitely NOT ketchup) and toppings! And then put the pizza into the oven! Do it in time and do it right or you will anger your customers! Gladly for you, we have a special "Irritation meter" which also serves as the Oven's chimney! It will help you prepare for some unexpected layoffs! But don't you worry about messing up the order, you have a colleague who will gladly "delete" all of your delicious mistakes, you just have to poke him. Good luck on your shifts!

This completely original chapter in the STAR WARS saga offers breakthrough technology in graphics and an entirely new storyline. Experience the most exhilarating and interactive space combat in this or any galaxy."

name: MediEvil
description:
The game takes place across a variety of levels, many of which require certain objectives to be performed to progress. Sir Daniel Fortesque can use a variety of weapons, consisting of close range weapons such as swords and clubs to long range weapons such as crossbows. Many of these weapons can be charged for a powerful attack and some weapons, such as the club, can be used to access areas that are otherwise inaccessible. When not possessing any items, Dan is able to rip his own arm off and use it for both melee and ranged attacks. Dan can equip a shield alongside weapons to defend against attacks; though they can only take several hits of damage before breaking. Throughout the game, Dan can visit gargoyle heads of two varieties; green ones offer Dan information while blue ones allow Dan to buy services or ammunition by using the treasures he finds.

Dan's health is determined by a single health bar, which reduces when Dan is hit. It will deplete completely if Dan drowns or falls from a great height. If Dan completely runs out of health, the game will end. Dan can extend his maximum health by collecting Life Bottles, which will automatically refill his health bar if it drops to zero. Also hidden throughout the game are Life Vials and Life Fountains that can replenish Dan's health and fill up any empty Life Bottles Dan has. In each level, there is a hidden Chalice of Souls, which can be collected if the player fills it with enough souls from defeated enemies (some Chalices are awarded via other means). If the player clears a level with a Chalice in hand, Dan is warped to the Hall of Heroes, where he can speak to a legendary hero who will give him rewards, such as weapons. If the player finishes the game with all the Chalices, the game's true ending is revealed.

name: Minecraft: Kung Fu Panda
description: Unleash your inner AWESOMENESS with the DreamWorks Kung Fu Panda DLC! Master kung fu alongside Po and the Furious Five at the Jade Palace. Kick, punch, and skadoosh your way through this adventure map filled with action-packed battles, epic showdowns from the movies, and a multiplayer mode for pand-tastic fun!

name: Where Have All the Globbletops Gone?
description:
The Magnificent Merle, an intrepid entomologist, happens across a mysterious book that hints towards the existence of elusive, mythical creatures called Globbletops. Out of his element, yet desperately in need of grant money for his floundering foundation, he decides to brave the long journey to the Farwaythians Peaks to unravel the ancient mystery of the Globbletops.

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 55 in April of 2024, whose theme was Summoning.

name: Grounded: Fully Yoked Edition
description:
The free 1.4 "Fully Yoked" content update for all players introduces royal Ant Queens, a New Game+ mode, full Japanese VO, and an exciting array of new weapons, armor, and more. Additional content includes new molars, infused bugs, the ability to upgrade gear past level 9, four new achievements, one new mutation, twelve Ant Queen-related buildings, new baby ant pets, and other gameplay additions. Beginning with this update, hosts can now load a save while in the middle of a multiplayer session and all connected players will seamlessly transition into the new game world.

Beat the Javamatic, Brood Mother, Mantis and Wasp Queen to open a secret door. What's behind the door?

The Fully Yoked updated is anticipated to be the final (large) update to Grounded

Join Harold in his clumsy undertakings to stir up the ark-like ship’s stale day-to-day life and find the secrets that lie behind its doors.

description: A language learning game created for a master's thesis -- play as one of four unique adventurers in the mysterious land of Anglonia, searching for the wish-granting artifact, the Heart of the Word. Practice listening comprehension, TOEIC vocabulary, and problem-solving.

name: Progress Chess
description: Progress Chess is the most complete simulator of chess and chess competitions to date, taking place in realistic 3D spaces: from a home apartment to a chess club! By playing in tournaments and solving problems, go from beginner to FIDE master!

name: Clicker Arena
description: Clicker Arena, the place where heroes are made and wheat is separated from the chaff. It's a new generation of idle games, the laid-back gameplay of clickers with randomness, replayability, and resource management usually found in roguelikes. Can you survive when every decision matters?

name: DeResolution
description: BANG...You awake to find yourself in a foreign place called TH3 GR1D. Explore, fight, and throw your digital vorpal frisbee to escape this digital landscape.

name: Tales of Anturia: Hejstos
description: Survive in the harsh world of Hejstos. Build a camp, defend it against orcs and other threats. And if you feel strong enough, discover the secret, hidden in the mountains and save your homeland from civil war.

name: Thor's Ascension: Nine Realms
description: Rule the god of thunder and challenge all the gods of the nine realms! In this Rogue-like, hack and slash game, develop your strategy and skills, subject all the gods who challenge you to your wrath, and become the only god of the universe.

name: Gazolinas
description: Gazolinas is a competitive arcade racing game. Master precision driving, customize classic cars, and compete globally across diverse tracks. Enjoy realistic physics and dynamic environments in this thrilling race to the top.

name: Survival Nation: Lost Horizon
description: Survival Nation: Lost Horizon is an open-world, top-down zombie survival game. Keep yourself and other survivors alive in a world gone to the zombies, upgrade your gear and skills, and keep civilization going in a world where humans are the top pick on the menu.

name: Cthulhu's Reach: Devil Reef
description: An action roguelike co-op dungeon crawler set in a lovecraftian universe.

name: Steel Republic: Rail Defender
description: SRRD is a hybrid of Strategy Railroad Logistics, Resource gathering, Base building, and Tower Defense

name: Imprisoned Hyperion 2
description: Imprisoned Hyperion 2 is an imersive sim, first-person rpg. Explore the dark and dangerous dungeon. Survive by finding safe resting places and cooking food. Help different creatures and learn the dark history of this world.

name: Dream Tactics
description: Choose your party, build your decks and battle with cards in Dream Tactics, a turn-based strategy RPG where character customization is key! Lead Neru and friends on an adventure to unravel the mystery of the Dream World and wake its inhabitants from eternal sleep.

name: Vertical Kingdom
description: Vertical Kingdom is a roguelite that mixes cities and cards. Due to the fact that there is not much space, you have to build vertically, with the help of platforms and other constructions. You will go on expeditions to obtain resources that will help you improve your camp for your next trips.

name: World Turtles
description: A wholesome colony builder where you help Meeps save the life of the World Turtle they live on. Construct buildings, harvest resources, allocate and prioritise tasks, research and develop, and cooperate with other Meeps. And who knows? You may even meet others from different worlds.

name: Survisland
description:
Survisland is a survival sandbox focused on Realism, located in a vast procedural generated world.
Taste every bitter and sweet as a lone man lost in wild islands, use your wit and strength to confront every challenge the Nature gives you.

name: Animal Night Market
description:
Today is your first day when you decide to start your career as a night market owner!
Here, you can create your own must-see night market.
R&D of food, decoration of stores, management of employees... Every step requires your careful management!
Away from the endless overtime, watching the desolate town become more and more prosperous with your efforts, you also rediscover the meaning of life.

name: Journey to the Centre of Nirn
description:
Follow in the steps of a famous explorer as you follow the clues to the location of a long lost city.
Travel through vast magma chambers and dark caverns solving puzzles, riddles and intriguing mazes before finally discovering the fate of a lost Ayleid city.

name: Up The Romhack
description: Sin descripción

name: 12 Vengeful Ghosts
description:
12 Vengeful Ghosts is Touhou Project meets 12 Angry Men.

This game is a narrative bullet hell very loosely inspired by the aforementioned film. You play as one of twelve ghosts responsible for deciding the fate of a mortal, but those other ghosts aren't nearly as forgiving as you.

name: Arcade ZX Collection: Tetris
description: Amazing clone of TETRIS from arcade machines ported to the Spectrum. When you load this game on your Spectrum you will be transported to the arcades of the 80s. Get ready for a trip back in time.

name: Slugger
description: Slugger is a 10-15 mins short and punchy map for Doom 2

name: RamsaySnap
description: A game about shooting characters for points but you need to avoid killing the wrong people. Instead of SnapShot characters you will be aiming real people but avoid the SnapShot characters at all costs.

name: Electrocardioground FX
description:
A minimalist arcade game about keeping the beat alive.

Features 2 game modes and alternating colours.

name: Quest and Arena
description: Sin descripción

name: Eureka
description: A Full Hack for Super Mario 64 with 100 Stars and many things to find. Some things are useful, some are not. That is for you to decide.

name: Lisa: The Undone
description: Based on the setting and stories established in Lisa: The Painful and Lisa: The Joyful by Dingaling, LISA: The UNDONE reimagines the storyline of Lisa: The Joyful into a longer, unique experience all its own, with countless rewrites, resprites, and alterations to the setting, story and gameplay that make it a very different experience with its own messages and story to tell. Follow a... different Buddy Armstrong and Rando as they seek to understand themselves and explore the eccentric world they inhabit.

name: Simulation Training Room: Massacre
description: Connect to the virtual world to kill zombies, gain experience and level up. Increase level and allocate skill points.

name: Happy Birthday: The Horror of Christmas
description: Merry Christmas! Happy New Year! But this year Santa has a big problem! His old friend Deer ran away from home! What the hell is going on here? !

name: Bendy: Secrets of the Machine
description:
Some things are better left forgotten.
Discover the interactable Secrets of the Machine by exploring Gent's creation and solving the puzzles within. Lurking amongst the shadows are glimpses to the past, the present, and the future of the Dark Puddles. But stay alert, this realm changes often...

name: Giresun
description: This is a 3rd person shooter game that you can play 1v1, 2v2, 4v4, 5v5 mods against bots.

name: CCO Car Crash Online Simulator
description: Crash car in super real physicsThe most real car damage and car stunts! Destroy cars with your friends online and become a fierce champion! Do you like driving races, pushing sneakers into the floor and turning on nitrous oxide? Then this game racing sim is just for you!

name: Wind Field
description: This is a super fun action game made with a fresh and cute cartoon style

name: The Cat
description: Face mental challenges as you help the feline overcome rotating platforms in his search for the ball of wool. With hand-drawn graphics, giving the game a unique aesthetic and captivating puzzles, thus testing the player's skill.

name: Dragon Warrior Girl
description: "Dragon Warrior Girl" is a large-scale adventure game that is one of the Souls-like games, you will play several powerful female generals, you can capture and absorb their soul and use it to upgrade and increase your potion usage. You will use several magical powers to defeat all enemies.

name: Rockets, Planes, Soldiers
description: A relaxing rock-paper-scissors mechanic, turn-based strategy on a hex-grid.

name: Demonology: Incubus: Chapter 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Entwined Time
description: In this two time manipulation puzzle game, help Light and Heavy reach and repair the Chrono Station's reactor after a catastrophic failure rends their timelines asunder (and also blows the Station to smithereens, turning it into hundreds of puzzles to traverse)!

name: Sanguine Holy Land
description: Sanguine Holy Land is a new episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports (complevel 2) made by the various members of Doomer Boards, lead by BiZ. The project theme was marble temples and blood rituals.

name: Kira Kira Magical Stars
description: Kira Kira Magical Stars is a cute fantasy magical girl top-down shooter and platformer.

name: SnapShot
description: A game about shooting characters for points but you need to avoid killing the wrong people.

name: Welcome to Bulletheck
description:
Welcome To BulletHeck is a small rougelike game focused on randomized items and conserving energy. Energy is consumed by both shooting and sprinting and running out will cause the player to slow down for a short time. New guns and items can be discovered as you progress as well as stat upgrades that can be bought from shops.

The only objective is to reach floor 10 and fight the boss.

name: Perfect Knife
description: Can you throw the perfect knife?

name: Orgasm Academy
description: Welcome to Orgasm Academy, an exhilarating adult only visual novel that transforms your studies into the most thrilling game of your life!

name: Sharkstorm
description: A monstrous tornado unleashes ravenous sharks on the waterlogged populace. As sharks and debris rain around you, fly close enough to the twisters to toss bombs in so the explosions will equalize the pressure and neutralize the storm.

name: Mob Control: Triple Backup Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Helix Jump: Party Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Golf Guys: Party Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: ASMR Slicing: Joyful Cutting Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Color Splash: Rodents
description: Color Splash: Rodents is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable rodents and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful rodent paintings.

name: Steel Symphony
description: Steel Symphony is a 2D Action-Strategy platformer where players craft combat sentinels by selecting components and balancing stats like integrity, mobility, and weapon capabilities. Chassis, weapons, and modules shape each sentinel's role with varied abilities for strategic customization.

name: Unreal Island
description: This is a delightful cartoon astronaut game!

name: Search All: Aliens
description: is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the aliens in a large location. The aliens will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Hearts
description: is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the hearts in a large location. The hearts will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to the most barely noticeable places

name: Shock Wave
description: On the Silent Night of All Saints, monsters come to the human world at night.

name: Illumination
description: In the dense forest, there are endless mysteries.

name: Overdelivery: Delivery Simulator
description: Overdelivery: Speed, Deliver, Conquer! Dominate city streets, upgrade your wheels, and become the ultimate delivery champ!

name: Helbreath Nemesis
description: Helbreath is a dark medieval MMORPG featuring intense PvP, strategic alliances, and a trade-centric economy. Choose between two warring factions and immerse yourself in epic battles and quests in a vast fantasy world.

name: The Lost Key
description: The task before you is very big, but you are not one of those who give up, it is your time, get up and move and retrieve the key.

name: Tiny Hero Idle
description: "Tiny Hero Idle": An Idle RPG on PC that allows simultaneous play with other games. Join a unique adventure with daily rewards and cool actions

name: Life of Thife
description: Try to escape from the wanted city! Gather the necessary supplies by yourself and fend off the guards' pursuit! Cooperative guards are waiting for you at the checkpoints along the escape route.

name: Deep Treasure
description: A 3D third-person dungeon crawling game. Arm yourself with useful equipment and items to find the hidden deep treasure.

name: Riddle for your Life
description: Do you have what it takes to solve all riddles? Your life may depend on it. The stakes are high. Winning grants you a powerful reward, losing means certain death. Are you brave enough to play the odds?

name: Witchcraft Survivors
description: Annihilate hordes of enemies in this thrilling, fast-paced action roguelite rpg and fill the screen with your magic. Kill your foes, become stronger each second and upgrade your characters with new spells and abilities. Can you survive the monsters that threaten your very existence?

name: Nightmare
description: Nightmare is a single-player survival-horror game. Once in a bad dream, you will have to decide: find a way to wake up or stay in it forever.

name: Yerr Out
description: A wacky & competitive baseball game! Choose from 30+ different animals to assemble your team, each with different attributes. Crush hits into the gap, throw nasty curveballs, make diving plays in the outfield, and bust out slides to breakup close plays.

name: MechNest
description: MechNest is a 3D bullet hell shooter developed by a single person. As you progress through the map, which changes with each challenge, collect reinforcement items and defeat powerful enemies with flashy shooting! Combine your skills freely and rampage through the hive of mechs!

name: Dragon's Bane
description: Dragon's Bane is a retro RPG for the 90's kid in us all.Adventure into the Forsaken Lands and engage in turn based combat with the foes you encounter. Loot, craft, discover secrets, build your Mage Knight's proficiency with spells or weaponry how you see fit. Save the world.

name: The Smurfs: Colorful Stories - Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Bowling Fever: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ring Academy
description: In 'Ring Academy', you'll embark on a surreal journey as the newest student at a school like no other. Your path to navigating this bizarre institution involves throwing rings to progress through levels, each more whimsical and eerie than the last. Prepare for the strangest classes you've ever attended, taught by eccentric teachers who are anything but normal.

name: Scrap Age Survivors
description:
Liberate the Rust Wanderers from the evil grasp of the Dominant Hand! Equip up to hundreds of thousands of load out combinations in this fast paced survivors style game!

Aid the Rust Wanderers in their quest for survival and peace in a post-apocalyptic world under the violent control of the Dominant Hand. Take on the role of ORIN and his friends while you take the fight back to your oppressors. Equip a variety of weapons and upgrade your robot as you harvest and collect the valuable scrap from your enemies. Enjoy nearly five hundred thousand possible loadouts for your bot by mixing and combining weapons and valuable quantum gems, creating a unique experience every game.

Venture into the Slaglands across three huge maps, with more on the way, laying waste to hundreds of enemy bots! Gain your independence from the Dominant Hand, just don't become Spare Parts yourself!

name: Burn With Me
description: Devil deckbuilder where you burn your cards to succeed.

name: The Torture House
description: In September 1994, Victoria Atkins, a young aspiring model, was traveling through Cooke County, Texas, in search of job opportunities when she suddenly disappeared. While it was initially believed she had simply become lost on the road, days passed without any sign of her. But what no one could imagine were the horrors of the ultra violence she would experience in a place that could easily be described as hell, The Torture House.

name: Drift Legacy: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Nblocks: Builder Pack 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Nblocks: Builder Pack 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Nblocks: Builder Pack 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Nblocks: Builder Pack 1
description: Sin descripción

name: The Smurfs: Colorful Stories - Personal Boards 6
description: Sin descripción

name: Freaky Trip: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Courageous Reasoning Nori 6 MikiEdition Last
description: Sin descripción

name: The Ruby Court
description: The Ruby Court is an interactive fiction game that takes inspiration from 90s and 2000s vampire fiction, with themes about conformity/the queer experience. And blood. Lots of blood.

name: Shopping Benfica
description: Shopping Benfica is a game about me and my best friend from high school beating the shit out of Totally Not Monica and Friends in Fortaleza.

name: Inspire
description: Inspire is a Stylized Top-Down Shooter set in the near future. Customize your arsenal, soar through the skies with your jetpack, and shoot your way through an alien invasion alongside your transformable backpack companion.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Cyberjunkie: Pro Pack
description: Get Call of Duty Points* and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 3 - Episode 02
description: Season 3 Episode 2: Legend of the Ten Dings! In an attempt to turn Daniel Average, Peter and Peggy find themselves fantasy role-playing in Saltamander-Pinte.

name: Jam Scrapz Collection: The Minesweeper
description: One private; no guns; just your wits and trusty mine detector. Your mission is to clear a path through the minefields in the Great Desert. In most levels, you will have to find a mine detector to clear the mines, or carefully navigate through the field and avoid triggering any mines.

name: Kit Cat
description: Cute cats need love! Discover the best jigsaw puzzle story with animals, a relaxing adventure for kids in 2D.

name: Age of Fear: War Machine
description: Follow the story of a down-on-his-luck Dwarf Engineer and the greatest invention of his life - the War Machine! Are you brave enough to bring this fearsome weapon from dream to reality?

name: Age of Fear: The Quick and The Dead
description: Team up with an exiled Rat Assassin in her dastardly quest for redemption! Are you cunning enough to see this criminal scheme through to the end?

name: HenapoLand: Tsuika Avatar Room
description: You can choose an additional avatar.

name: Park Them All!
description: Welcome to the ultimate parking adventure - "Park It All!" Get ready to rev your engines and test your precision in this thrilling video game where you become the master of parking! Dive into the world of "Park It All!

name: Alchemy Pipes Puzzle
description: Alchemy Pipes Puzzle is an exciting game for puzzle enthusiasts and those who love challenges! Test yourself in 4 game modes and over 200 levels! Now available on the Nintendo Switch!

name: Ball Tour
description: Sin descripción

name: Metal Savior Black
description: Sin descripción

name: Bird Tapper vs the Krampus Fellowship Clan
description: "Bird Tapper vs the Krampus Fellowship Clan features over a dozen new levels for Purple Platoon Panic made by members of the community. Why isn't it called the Purple Platoon Panic map-pack, you ask? Because it's more fun this way."

name: Rubber Bandits: Animal Bandits
description: What's the best disguise to go on a heist? Of course dressing up as (or literally being) a cute or wild animal! No one suspects a fluffy animal for a bandit.

name: Gas Station Simulator, Airstrip DLC and Can Touch This DLC Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Ramen Oil Simulator
description: Use the mouse to drag and move the oil droplets, aiming to gather the floating oil into a cluster.

name: Color Road: Sweet & Shiny
description: Sin descripción

name: Farmyard Haven
description: Dive into a world of endless possibilities as you design and customize your very own farm without the hassle of resource management.

name: Exploration Adventures
description: Explore the enchanting world! a captivating exploration game that invites you to embark on a tranquil journey through a lush, mysterious lands.

name: King Krieg Survivors
description: Embrace your sovereignty, defend your realm, and conquer the relentless tide of enemies.

name: Nblocks: Unblock Your Creativity
description: Design, build and create all of your fantastic ideas!

name: One Last Dinner
description: You are a famous detective. Examine the evidence around you, read the notes left for you and listen to audio recordings, follow clues, write down your findings, interrogate suspects. How would you like to be the shining star of the scene?

name: Bbosong
description: The game starts when the player presses the door. Move using the left and right arrow keys. To exit, press the exit button on the main scene. There are no save points and if you fail you have to play from the beginning. There are up to 4 stages.

name: Heart and Core
description: A twin-stick action brawler. Young engineer JJ and her robot companion, KAI, evade the totalitarian control of the ruthless Santiago. Traverse, hide, and fight your way through a seemingly unending onslaught of enemy RAMs. Use JJ’s Gravity Gun and KAI’s fists to stun and destroy enemies.

name: Batiman
description: Indie game for kids and adults.

name: Impractical Spells
description: The rules of the game are simple. Pick cards to get stronger. Be the last wizard standing to win, Win 8 rounds to win the game.

name: Living Metal
description: A platformer puzzle game about robots, where you play as a living metal and complete puzzles through possession, adhesion, control, and more.

name: Echoes
description: Immerse yourself in a stunning sci-fi visual novel. In a fractured Federation on the brink, Captain Zara Kincaid is caught between political schemes and an enigmatic alien force. Your choices determine her path and the fate of worlds.

name: Mr. Scientist
description: Mr. Scientist is a single player horror game. You are a hostage of a mad scientist and now you need to escape from his house.

name: Forget Something?
description: A thrilling and fast-paced indie horror game.

name: LowPoly Towerdefense
description: You play in a SciFi environment with LowPoly graphics, engaging in Tower Defense. Manage resources! Each round introduces more enemies that you must defeat. Build resource ships in the factory and simultaneously construct towers on the platforms to fend off the adversaries.

name: VGA Planets Nu
description: A graphical multi-player play by turn war game that simulates combat in space between galactic empires.

name: OG Memory: Synthwave Monsters
description: OG Memory: Synthwave Monsters/b] is an memory game with scary monster images. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. your best round will be count and always be displayed in game, to compare your rounds. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: Kings And Goblins
description: Try your best with this old-school difficult platformer game. Kings and Goblins will truly test your skill, will you be able to beat the game??

name: School Paranormal Laboratory
description: To those who will become investigators at our research institute, Our institute conducts research on mysterious phenomena and grudges that occur in schools. As an investigator, you will carry out field surveys, but it is a simple job that even those with no experience can perform.

name: Coloring Pixels: Celtic Pack
description: Celtic BookThis Celtic-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Patterns, traditions and so much more!Explore the history of the Celtic people with this historical pack!

name: Hentai Girls
description: Hentai Girls is a laid-back puzzle game featuring numerous distinctive and sexy girls. Engage in a jigsaw puzzle experience, where players manipulate puzzle pieces to reconstruct the original image.

name: Battlegrounds: The Pirate King
description: Battlegrounds : The Pirate King is an action adventure game set in a pirate world. Embark on an adventure to save what is left of the pirate world. Discover islands, capture ships and fight the king's navy. Recruit pirates onboard and manage your ship's resources. Defeat Davy Jones and be a legend.

name: Watermelon Game: Fruits Puzzle
description:
Experience the thrill of stacking and merging fruits in this deceptively simple yet captivating gameplay. Drop various fruits into the box and watch as the physics come alive, making them roll, shift, and merge upon contact.
Create mesmerizing chain reactions by merging identical fruits, building up to the ultimate Watermelon – not only a points bonanza but also a container-consuming giant.

name: Lands of Avaronia
description: Lands of Avaronia is an oldschool fantasy RPG in which you take a role as one of the Mercenaries. Help the Kingdom to push back the Orcish Invasion which is threatening to the Human nation. Discover the mysteries of Avaronia, a classic fantasy adventure awaits you.

name: SokoPenguin
description: SokoPenguin is a Sokoban-style puzzle game, where you control a penguin who must push boxes to clear the path to its cozy igloo.

name: Nightmare Collection: Telephone Call
description: Telephone Call is a short horror story about receiving strange phone call during a party.

name: Soundelta
description: A rhythm game with a unique spin: Spinning. Push your skill to the limit with 3 sets of 3 lanes on a spinning notefield. Featuring a growing roster of songs, VFX in every map, and a powerful editor for custom maps.

name: NewMe NuMe LuMe: Alien Wars
description: Summoned into the otherworldly realm of 'NewMe NuMe LuMe', the protagonist Kim Ttolttol must aid the gods who summoned him to defeat enemies and return home in this 2D top-down action game. Utilize a variety of weapons to vanquish diverse foes!

name: Stickman Killing Zombie
description: The stickman world is in a zombie epidemic- kill zombie stickmen with your epic red sword!

name: Ghost Room
description: Strange phenomena occur one after another in one apartment. You, an exorcist, are asked to investigate and go to the room, but you are trapped by the spirits living in the room. The only way to escape is to suppress all the spiritual phenomena caused by the spirits.

name: Cryptrio
description: A monstrous match three arcade game with a twist! Connect the shapes in the right places to clear monsters from the dungeon and beat the bosses, all in the name of chasing the highest possible score.

name: Wacky Burgers
description: "Wacky Burgers" is a casual and cute point-and-click game. You are a staff member of a hamburger store that is visited by many funny customers, and you have to help the store by selling lots of food.

name: Lever Simulator: Multiplayer
description: Manipulate powerful machinery using 2 computer mice in diverse game modes. Command Mecha-robots, Artillery Cannons, and mobile Ballistas with diverse mechanics. Challenge friends in unique PVP multiplayer matches.

name: Quest Eternal
description: Speed you way through different levels and environments in this old-school platformer. Unlock new abilities and try to complete the levels as fast as possible. Go back to previous levels and try to beat your old score using your newfound power. Fight and defeat evil on your eternal quest.

name: Retrolution Racing
description: Choose one of 36 top-class cars and join the world of retro car racing.

name: The Shadow Cat
description: Transform into a mysterious black cat, navigate through various traps in the shadows, and find the treasure in the ancient castle.

name: Sicaria
description: Antwerp 1576, Spanish Fury is putting the city to the sword. You intend to stop the atrocities by eliminating the menace. ​Silhouette is a FREE game made by third year students from Breda University.

name: Fumo
description: "Fumo" is a 3D immortal MMORPG, set against the backdrop of ancient Chinese mythology, fairy tales, allusions, and history, depicting a magnificent and imaginative painting for players.

name: Timewinder
description: TIMEWINDER is a 2D platformer with puzzle and precision elements. Run, jump, dash and travel in time to brave the obstacles and continue on your journey, but be careful not to break the timeline continuity!

name: Paper Plane Arena: Lost Places
description: Paper Plane Arena is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun popping innocent balloons. You jump into the role of a little paper plane that is supposed to rescue the world from little but evil balloon demons by dashing through them.

name: I Commissioned Some Bunnies 3
description: I paid artists to hide bunnies and carrots in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Phenom
description: In the midst of an outbreak of a mysterious virus that turns people into crazed zombies, James's wife has disappeared and now he has to find her and survive in a zombie apocalypse with moving around the grid using improvised means, environment and logic.

name: The Tower Of Babel
description: Play the most popular story from the bible. The tower of babel is a unique tower - builder and RPG. Pick a leader, hire workers, manage the economy of the building site and the lives of your workers. Remember you have 7 days to complete the tower before language barrier becomes a major problem.

name: The Talos Principle II: Devolver Deluxe Edition
description: The Talos Principle II is a thought-provoking first-person puzzle experience that greatly expands on the first game's philosophical themes and stunning environments with increasingly mind-bending challenges. The Talos Principle II Devolver Deluxe includes a 220-page artbook packaged in a collector's box along with the physical game.

name: Virtu-Pilot
description: Get ready for take-off, cadet! Enter an immersive UE5 experience that will elevate your light aircraft procedure skills. Master preliminary checks, interior/exterior startup checks, and gain the confidence to soar. Planned features: AI instructors, multiplayer and radio communications training.

name: Void Wizard
description: Dual-wield wands to levitate, manipulate time, conjure explosions, and use other unique abilities in this fast-paced FPS roguelike! Explore procedurally generated dungeons. Buy powerful upgrades from suspicious looking shopkeepers. Defeat the void wizard.

name: Pussy Kingdom: Queen of Passion
description: Embark on a magical adventure where you will have to unite all the kingdoms and save the world from evil.

name: Tinkerlands: A Shipwrecked Adventure
description: Tinkerlands: A Shipwrecked Adventure is your portal to the expansive world of Tinkerlands. Uncover the story of the first survivors on these mystical and fantastical islands. Explore the breathtaking archipelago, craft essential tools, build your settlement, and strive to survive!

name: Ultimate Scroll
description: This is a casual card game set in the backdrop of cultivation-themed Xianxia world. In this game, players control cultivators who challenge demon caves, search for treasures in the treasure pavilion, and overcome tribulations in the heavenly tower to enhance their cultivation levels.

name: Mow That Lawn
description: Action-packed sidescrolling gardening-shooter, with colorful comicbook-style graffics and gameplay inspired by the arcade-machines of the early 80's. Mow that lawn, jump over the holes and don't let piles of dirt, animals, drones-with-water-balloons or mischievous friends, get in your way.

name: Trimurti Online
description: Relive the classic gameplay of an old-school MMORPG. Select a class that suits your style and join your friends to explore the vast world of Trimurti Online. Enhance your equipment and maximize your skills to complete quests, confront monsters and bosses, conquer dungeons, and fight other players!

name: Stellar Bewitching Remastered
description: A Remastered version of the game "Stellar Bewitching!" With brand new character redesigns and art done by Berry B! A Sci-Fi turn-based RPG that takes place parallel to the events of Rave Heart. Featuring teenage drama, touching storylines, and boss battles the likes of which will test your turn-based knowledge!

name: Miya
description: The stunning warrior maiden gracefully dances through the battlefield, slicing through demons with her blade, collecting resources, unlocking stunning outfits, and embracing the ultimate thrill of action!

name: Tongue Tale
description: Join our little frog on a journey to save its world! Navigate through challenging levels in this hand-crafted platformer. With each leap and obstacle, you're one step closer to restoring balance. Dive in and help our amphibian hero make a difference!

name: Arthas 2
description: The continuation of a great game about a great man!

name: Rootin' Tootin' Lootin' & Shootin'
description: Rootin' Tootin' Lootin' & Shootin' is a unique fusion of traditional turn-based roguelikes and twin-stick shooters. A fast-paced take on strategy games where you dodge deadly bullet patterns and kill enemies for their money - all at your own pace

name: Become a Star
description: Play as a musician on his journey to success in this virtual reality rhythm game! Choose your instrument, prepare your concerts on stage, and feel the crowd vibrate to the rhythm of original songs!

name: Persona 5: The Phantom X
description: Persona 5: The Phantom X is a spin-off of Persona 5, and is officially authorized by SEGA with deep involvement by Atlus.

name: Demolition Party
description: Demolition Party is a 4 player online multiplayer car party game. Enjoy unique maps and use tons of different guns to "demolish" your friends!

name: Jam Scrapz Collection
description: A collection of old Game Jam projects revamped, remastered, and rebooted for commercial and more playable value! More than two handfuls of games to play!

name: Dusk Pub
description: As the manager of Dusk Pub, you have to put in a lot of efforts to run your own worn-down bar and expand your business to other parts of the land Brent. Meet a variety of cute girls and recruit them as servers, helping them develop their business talent and know them inside out.

name: Our Adventurer Guild
description: Become the new Guild Master of the Adventurer Guild and lead your adventurers in explorations and turnbased tactical battles. Will the Guild strive under your leadership? Or will it finally disband under it?

name: Aiyana
description: Aiyana is an open world voxel survival game. Explore the lush world to gather enough resources and take on the creatures of the night. Once you are ready, enter their portals to fight them back and earn your place on the global leaderboards.

name: Island of Penance
description: Having doubts about her father's "accidental" death, Illumina begins to look deeper into the reports. The information leads her on a journey to become a prison guard on a notorious prison island. There she must contend with felons and corrupt officials to uncover the truth.

name: Age of Fear 5: The Day of the Rat
description: Play as Indulf, a Black Knight in the Undead Legion with ambitions to build an empire of his own. Alongside the young Witch Lexa, set out on a lawless quest to plunder the realm. Age of Fear is a complex turn-based strategy series (full of jokes!) that fuses a tabletop wargame with RPG elements.

name: Wrath of the Mad King
description: Fight, explore, loot gear & craft gadgets. Evil is coming and it falls upon you to protect humanity. Explore futuristic Earth, fight the Sentian Race & discover the mysteries of our planet. If you don't stop them, the arrival of these robotic visitors may be the end of human life as we know it.

name: Color Road
description: Welcome to the colorful race!

name: Arena Breakout: Season 4 - Into the Fog of War

name: Murder on the Spaceship Altair
description:
Jupiter‘s fourth moon, Callisto—once the location of humanity’s most advanced research base. One day, “Zion Frontier,” as it was called, was struck by a mysterious explosion.

One year later, the fractured remains of the base are recovered by a manned ship called “Altair.” Among the remains was a frozen capsule containing the body of genius space engineer Zion Miller, and the android Flem nestled beside the capsule. And then there was Hope, the extraterrestrial life-form discovered in the Jupiter space.

A mysterious incident involving them and the crew soon occurs on-board the ship. Was this incident caused by the mysterious life-form? Or by the crew? With no means of escape, fear and suspicion spread throughout the ship…

You play as the Master AI of the spaceship Altair and end up partnering with Flem in order to solve the mystery. Issue commands to Flem and investigate the ship. Depending on the command, you may be able to communicate with the crew through physical contact and the like… Interact with the crew through various means and strengthen your relationships.

description:
It is a tribute to Contra and Metal Slug.

It is inspired by internet meme "Hans get ze Flammenwerfer"

description: You gain your personal Dragon Hatchling Pet which will follow you around in the game. The pet is an item that will automatilly be recovered upon losing. You can unlock but also dismiss the pet by simply clicking on the item.

description: Climb aboard and take the throttle of one of North America's most historic - and fastest - steam locomotives and “highball” the fabulous Empire State Express with New York Central & Hudson River 4-4-0 No. 999, masterfully created for Train Simulator Classic by Machine Rail!

description: The arrival of rowdy tourists disrupts the serenity of a group of tropical islands home to the meticulous ecologists Pirate Sisters. As the ambition of the castaways agitates the ecosystem, it's up to its self-proclaimed protectors to take matters into their own hands and restore their home.

name: College Gay Sex: Episode 3
description: An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters. Cody’s journey as a gay college student continues with an intense menage at the gym as Jax recruits a senior student to help them train for the football team.

name: Memorial Circuit
description: A scientist decides to participate in a secret research project inorder to bring back his wife whom he lost in the war. As he progresses in his research, he slowly encounters the sinister truths and threats hidden behind.

name: Rebornia
description: Embark on a captivating journey through Rebornia, a turn-based MMORPG with immersive low-poly visuals and dynamic gameplay. Join a vibrant community, unleash powerful spells, and forge your destiny in a fantastical world filled with adventure and discovery.

name: SOS OPS!: Guns n' Ops
description: GUNS N' OPS! is not just DLC, it's an explosive party in the world of shooters that will turn your perception of strategy and fun upside down. Are you ready to dive into this insane chaos?

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Mega Bites Free Pack
description: Make your rivals bite the dust with the Mega Bites Free Pack! Unleash Hotweiler, an untameable purebred with ruthless strength and the legendary Shark Bite, which will give you a sea of satisfaction. Devour your opponents in one bite!

description: Do you want to create your dream Kitchen? With the Kitchen DLC it's now possible. You can create any kitchen you want. Any size, any color combination, any budget, separate or combined with a living room - it's all up to you.

name: My Dream Setup: Bathroom DLC
description: Do you want to create your dream Bathroom? With the Bathroom DLC it's now possible. You can create any bathroom you want. Any size, any color combination, any budget, shared or separate - it's all up to you.

description: Attention, attention! Gold prospectors of all plots, unite! A new shipment of machines is heading to the Equipment Store. Among them you will find mini machines that will improve your work and allow you to operate even more efficiently!

name: WolfQuest: Anniversary Edition - Hellroaring Mountain
description: Hellroaring Mountain rises above the Yellowstone River in north-central Yellowstone, several kilometers west of Slough Creek. This 8x8 kilometer map offers all the gameplay of the main Yellowstone maps with a few special new features.

You are trapped in an abandoned house in the woods.
You try to leave the house, but the door won't open.
You have to find a way out...
