description: An outsider in the Dragon Slayer series emerges! Progress through the adventure by switching between family members with different abilities! Defeat the dragon

name: Hero's Hour
description: A fast turn-based strategy RPG with real-time combat.

name: SoulShake
description: After waking up, you will find a way to escape from an abandoned hospital in the basement and figure out what happened.

name: Eldorado FPS
description: Eldorado FPS: A thrilling FPS adventure with diverse modes - Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, Gun Mode, and Zombie Survival. Customize load-outs, compete globally, and rise in the ranks. Intense action, strategy, and endless fun await!

name: Tumble Ball
description: Tumble Ball is a 3D-cubic maze solver with a simple goal; find the exit. Navigate complicated labyrinths in various shapes and sizes, and compete with people from all over the world, for your place on the leaderboards.

name: Football Cup 2024
description: Harness your football skills and lead your team to international glory! Lace-up your boots and get ready to hit the field like never before!

name: Deep in The Fear
description: Dive into heart-pounding terror with our co-op horror experience for 5 players. Uncover chilling mysteries, face unspeakable horrors, and survive together in this intense collaborative nightmare. Will your team escape the shadows, or succumb to the darkness that lurks within?

name: Time Avarice
description: Time is your currency and challenge. Destroy crystals for time; lose it if they vanish. Every run offers new power-ups, with choices that shape your journey. Unlock more as you play, all set in a visually dynamic, arcade-inspired space roguelite.

name: Warrior Lords
description: Warrior Lords offers a furious medieval arcade experience, drawing inspiration from classic beat 'em ups. Battle through Western Europe wielding cold steel, delivering powerful kicks and summoning dragons. Choose from 6 unique heroes and defeat your rivals in a quest for supremacy.

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws: Wallace & Gromit - Vacation
description: Pixel Puzzles Aardman, the definitive jigsaw puzzler for the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws: Wallace & Gromit - A Matter Of Loaf And Death
description: Pixel Puzzles Aardman, the definitive jigsaw puzzler for the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws: Variety Pack 1
description: Pixel Puzzles Aardman, the definitive jigsaw puzzler for the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws: The Farmers Llamas
description: Pixel Puzzles Aardman, the definitive jigsaw puzzler for the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws: Shaun The Sheep
description: Pixel Puzzles Aardman, the definitive jigsaw puzzler for the PC platform.

name: Pixel Puzzles Aardman Jigsaws
description:
Immerse yourself in a whimsical world of creativity with our latest digital jigsaw puzzle game, featuring the beloved characters from Aardman! Pixel Puzzles Aardman brings you iconic scenes from the lovable Wallace & Gromit to the hilarious Shaun the Sheep and much more. The game features 26 free puzzles with piece counts ranging from 96 to 425.

Dive into the enchanting world of Aardman, where every piece tells a story, and every puzzle piece placed brings you closer to the magic!

name: Easy Jigsaw Puzzle
description: A puzzle game that combines traditional puzzles with a few less serious ones.

name: Japan Train Models: JR Freight Edition
description: Japan Train Models 4th edition features trains from JR Freight Japan! Japan Train Models is a model train puzzle and layout crafting game for model train fans that allows you to create "Train Models" and "Scenery" just like a puzzle.

name: Deber
description: Deber is a short platform game where you play as Deber, a minor demon. You have to help your demon lord to get back his precious flame, which gives him his power.

name: Motorcycle Extreme Driver: Moto Racing Simulator
description: Extreme motorcycle racing on dangerous tracks is a game for adrenaline junkies and motocross fans!

name: Steel Sand Mars Chronicles: Survival Simulator
description: Survive, Adapt, Unravel: Conquer the Martian Frontier!

name: Frank Fux
description:
In this daring adventure, you as Frank Fux try to using wit and jumping power to escape the depths of the dungeon and satisfy your greed.

Navigate Frank from platform to platform with only one direction in mind - upwards!
But be careful! A wrong jump can quickly send you back into the depths.

name: Reminiscence in the Rain
description: The world's most "sentimental" tale. "Let's go away together." Those were Yuika Aoi's last words. It was the winter of my first year of college. She disappeared, without a trace. Where had she gone? - only the flower knows.

name: Crazy Destruction
description: Crazy Destruction is a 3D physics puzzle game in which fun and exciting levels of varying difficulty await you! Take control of a mechanical cannon and destroy everything in your path! Using tactics and thinking, calculate every shot you take, because you're running out of ammunition!

name: Mysterious Planet
description: Mysterious Planet - A fascinating 3D puzzle game for logic and thinking! Your ship is forced to land on a mysterious planet due to lack of fuel. And now a mysterious and fascinating world filled with puzzles opens up before you!

name: Dark Rampage
description: Dark Rampage is an 2D platformer with action elements where you play as a hero who finds himself in a dark and dangerous world after he falls into a dark well. You have to explore various locations, fight monsters and solve puzzles.

name: Dungeon Ruins
description: Dungeon Ruins is a 2D platformer with roguelike elements in which you will find yourself in the shoes of a brave pioneer exploring mysterious dungeons full of treasures and dangers. You have to go through multi-story labyrinths filled with various enemies, riddles and treasures.
